title: Do Suppressions no longer trigger CoC?
body: Pbe tooltip no longer says hard CC but says off a taunt, stun, snare, or knockup.

replies.body: What triggers CoC hasn't changed. This is just a tooltip adjustment.
What does CoC stand for? Or rather the 'o'.
To that end, it should be noted that a suppression is just a stun that can't be reduced by tenacity that also silences its target, I believe.

Hard CC is a better tooltip then listing them out in my opinion.

But you should also probably add to the fact that supressions do it as well. If your going to keep it that way.
Will suppression be added to the tooltip?
Lol before i figured out what CoC was I jokingly asked my friend and his reply was "A beautiful thing".
It may be part of the CoC nerfs.
